Method Detail

join

public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> join(java.util.List<?> source,
                                                      java.lang.String prefix,
                                                      java.lang.String joiner,
                                                      java.lang.String suffix,
                                                      boolean skipEmptyElements)
                                               throws SmartFrogInitException
take a vector of name value pairs like [["a",true],["b",3]] and create a list like ["-Da=true","-Db=3"] with configurable prefix, joiner and suffix strings.

the return type is a vector

Parameters:
source - list source. All elements must contain a list, itself two elements long.
prefix - optional prefix for every element
joiner - optional string to use between each pair
suffix - optional suffix to use at the end
skipEmptyElements - should empty elements be skipped, or reported as an error
Returns:
a merged array or null if an empty list came in.
Throws:
SmartFrogInitException - if a list is the wrong width, type or missing

crack

public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> crack(java.lang.String uriList)
split a list of string values into separate elements of a vector. dumb simple parsing

Parameters:
uriList - string list separated by whitespace
Returns:
the string cracked; may be empty for no interesting content

stringify

public static java.lang.String stringify(java.util.Vector source,
                                         java.lang.String prefix,
                                         java.lang.String separator,
                                         java.lang.String ending)
turn a vector of strings into a space separated list

Parameters:
source - source vector
prefix - prefix to insert
separator - separator string
ending - ending string
Returns:
String string list.

public static java.util.Properties convertToProperties(java.util.List<?> tupleList)
                                                throws SmartFrogResolutionException
Convert a property list into a Java properties class

Parameters:
tupleList - a list of tuples (can be null)
Returns:
a properties object containing name,value pairs.
Throws:
SmartFrogResolutionException - if one of the list entries is not a tuple

resolveStringList

public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> resolveStringList(Prim component,
                                                                   Reference ref,
                                                                   boolean required)
                                                            throws SmartFrogResolutionException,
                                                                   java.rmi.RemoteException
Extract a string list; everything is converted to strings in the process

Parameters:
component - component to resolve against
ref - a reference
required - whether the element is required or not
Returns:
the list, or null if none was provided
Throws:
SmartFrogResolutionException - if the resolution fails.
java.rmi.RemoteException - network problems

resolveNTupleList

public static java.util.Vector<java.util.Vector<?>> resolveNTupleList(Prim component,
                                                                      Reference ref,
                                                                      int width,
                                                                      boolean required)
                                                               throws SmartFrogResolutionException,
                                                                      java.rmi.RemoteException
Extract a string tuple list; verify the depth is 2. Everything is converted to strings in the process

Parameters:
component - component to resolve against
ref - a reference
width - width; use a negative number for any
required - whether the element is required or not
Returns:
the tuple list, or null if none was provided
Throws:
SmartFrogResolutionException - if one of the list entries is not a tuple, or the resolution otherwise fails.
java.rmi.RemoteException - network problems

resolveStringNTupleList

public static java.util.Vector<java.util.Vector<java.lang.String>> resolveStringNTupleList(Prim component,
                                                                                           Reference ref,
                                                                                           int width,
                                                                                           boolean required)
                                                                                    throws SmartFrogResolutionException,
                                                                                           java.rmi.RemoteException
Extract a string tuple list; verify the depth is 2. Everything is converted to strings in the process

Parameters:
component - component to resolve against
ref - a reference
width - width of the n-tuple; use a negative number for 'any'
required - whether the element is required or not
Returns:
the tuple list, or null if none was provided
Throws:
SmartFrogResolutionException - if one of the list entries is not a tuple, or the resolution otherwise fails.
java.rmi.RemoteException - network problems

flattenStringList

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> flattenStringList(java.util.List<?> src,
                                                                 java.lang.String listName)
                                                          throws SmartFrogInitException
flatten a string list, validating type as we go. recurses as much as we need to. At its most efficient if no flattening is needed.

Parameters:
src - source list
listName - name of the list, for reporting errors
Returns:
a flatter list
Throws:
SmartFrogInitException - if there is an element that is not of the right type
